author: Digital Foundry
description:
Digital Foundry is now fully independent! Join the DF Supporter Program and support the team: https://bit.ly/3jEGjvx

Cronos: The New Dawn sees Bloober doing what it does best in delivering an excellent survival horror experience. However, unfortunately, it also sees Bloober repeating many of the UE5 problems from Silent Hill 2. Alex shares his experiences and delivers some optimised settings that can literally double performance. 

Go here to check out DF merch! https://store.digitalfoundry.net

Subscribe for more Digital Foundry: http://bit.ly/DFSubscribe

00:00:59 What kind of a game is Cronos: The New Dawn?

00:14:00 Conclusion
title: Cronos: The New Dawn PC - DF Review - Plus: 113% Perf Boosts via Optimised Settings
